titles.title: O Lord While We Confess Thy Worth (easy)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lord while we confess the worth Of This the outward seal Do Thou the truths herein set forth To ev'ry heart revealed{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Death to the world we here avow Death to each fleshly lust Newness of life our calling now A risen Lord our trust{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And we O Lord who now partake Of resurrection life With ev'ry sin for Thy dear sake Would be at constant strife{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Baptized into the Father's name We'd walk as sons of God Baptized in Thine we own Thy claim As ransomed by Thy blood{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Baptized into the Holy Ghost We'd keep His temple pure And make Thy grace our only boast And by Thy strength endure{/lang-eng}
